name: Zombie Virus (itch) (Masab Farooque, Samia Tariq)
description:
Zombies are EVERYWHERE, You are the lone survivor and you have to survive for as long as you can.

The only job you have is to survive as long as you can, if the zombie eats you, you will become a zombie as well.

How to play?

W A S D to move the character.
